title: Council Fracture and Scandal
outcome: After the shadow compliance scandal, Council factions turn on each other, leaking secrets about BCI’s troubled origins. Public outrage grows as evidence surfaces of sabotage and cover-ups in original BCI rollouts, leading to paralysis at the core of government.

events.description: Rifts within Council explode as Directorate and Harmonist factions leak each other's secrets, exposing infighting over BCI history.
Files surface detailing fabrication of BCI pilot zone data and sabotage during rollout, implicated senior council members. Old evidence from early pilot projects contradicts official history.
Public demonstrations reignite, fueled by betrayal and evidence that some citizens' erasure was intentional political maneuvering, not system glitch.
Council’s authority collapses as mid-level operators and citizens openly reject directives. Competing political statements are distributed by Council factions.
Amid growing chaos, no unified leadership emerges. Neighborhood assemblies and resistance networks begin coordinating core services parallel to the BCI-driven city.
